snippet.title: Atomfall | Official Extended Gameplay Deep Dive Trailer
snippet.description:
Step into the quarantine zone and uncover the secrets of Atomfall in this extended gameplay deep dive. This trailer explores the core gameplay pillars, including exploration, investigation, survival mechanics, and combat.

Atomfall will launch on March 27, 2025 and is now available to pre-order. Atomfall is coming day one to Game Pass, Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Windows PC and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store. Atomfall will also release on PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4.

Pre-Order Atomfall here: http://reb.to/YTPreOrderAF
Pre-order on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/801800/Atomfall/
Pre-order on PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/UP4363-PPSA15493_00-ATOMFALLBASEGAME
Pre-order on Xbox: https://www.xbox.com/en-GB/games/store/atomfall/9P483QMD1STK/0017
Pre-Order on Epic Games Store: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/atomfall 

The official Rebellion channels covers all content related to Sniper Elite and Atomfall! On this channel you can expect us to be the number source for DLC, Updates, News, Chapters, Gameplays, and more. Sniper Elite and Atomfall will be released on PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, and PC. 

Welcome to Atomfall: 0:00
Mystery & Investigation: 1:28
Exploration: 6:05
Combat: 9:52

Follow us on:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AtomfallGame/
Twitter/X: https://x.com/AtomfallGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/atomfallgame/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@rebelliondevelopments
Rebellion Twitter/X: https://x.com/Rebellion

Join the conversation: 
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/rebellion_official
Discord: https://discord.gg/rebellion 
Find out more about Rebellion at https://rebellion.com/ 
Find out more about Atomfall at https://atomfall.com

Directed by: Mario Cifuentes
Edited By: EzForBaba
Narrated By: Jack Wilson
Gameplay Capture By: Respawned Gentleman, Mario Cifuentes
Scripted & Written By: Respawned Gentleman, Mario Cifuentes
Thumbnail By: Sean Hoffert

#atomfall #atomfallgameplay
